definition: sticky/glutinous/(Tw) to adhere/to stick on/to glue
to add/to attach/to be close to/to be attached

sentences.english: Objective To explore the anti-adhesion effects of heparin on endothelial cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討肝素對內皮細胞黏附功能的影響。

sentences.english: There is much of the old that clings on and must be removed.
sentences.chinese: 有許多舊的黏附着，必須被清除。

sentences.english: The vine still clings to the moldering wall.
sentences.chinese: 藤仍然黏附於腐朽牆壁。

sentences.english: If it is pure, the honey will stick together and sink as a solid lump to the bottom of the glass.
sentences.chinese: 如果這蜂蜜純正，它就會黏附在一起，整團沉到杯底。

sentences.english: Such expansion ex vivo may not influence the expression of the adhesive molecule CD44 on cord blood cells.
sentences.chinese: 體外擴增不影響躋血細胞黏附分子CD44的表達。

sentences.english: Au-Pt alloy does not resist the growth and adhesion of the bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 金鉑合金對細菌的生長黏附無抑制作用。

sentences.english: It has a high tack adhesive on the bottom layer for maximum adhesion to the substrate.
sentences.chinese: 底層塗有高粘度的粘膠劑，可黏附於各種表面。

sentences.english: Cell adhesion is one of important steps in the multi-step process of gastric cancer pathogenesis.
sentences.chinese: 細胞黏附是胃癌發病的多階式機理中的重要一步。

sentences.english: A cationic adhesive-type natamycin nanometer eye drop comprises natamycin, a proper amount of osmoregulator and pH regulator.
sentences.chinese: 一種陽離子黏附型那他黴素納米滴眼液。

sentences.english: Neutrophil adhesion numbers and change pattern in pedicle and ear were the same.
sentences.chinese: 耳部中性粒細胞黏附數量與蒂部呈現相同的變化規律。

sentences.english: Compared with PLGA. the adhesiveness rate was calculated.
sentences.chinese: 並以PLGA作爲對照，計算細胞黏附率。

definition: to adhere to a surface/to absorb/to draw in/(fig.) to attract/(chemistry) adsorption
agglutinative (in linguistics, a characteristic of Altaic languages)
